SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_DELETE_LOCK_CHILD_FOR_SPONSORSHIP_SELECTION
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Delete stored procedure for sponsorship child selected lock table
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_DELETE_LOCK_CHILD_FOR_SPONSORSHIP_SELECTION ( @OPPORTUNITYID uniqueidentifier ) as begin -- do work delete dbo.USR_CHILD_SELECTED_FOR_SPONSORSHIP_LOCK where OPPORTUNITYID = @OPPORTUNITYID end
